channel.title: Customizing quests
channel.description:
hi... i need help with adding quests to my server and was wondering if someone could give me a step by step tutorial/guide that could tell me how to do so(or at least tell me where i can find one, and please dont say google it because i have already tried and i've found no results whatsoever and if you dont believe me you can try it your self) i think it has some thing to do with quest.java and dialogues.cfg but i'm not certain.
much appreciated.
